content:
= Test Article with DRB Bible Wikilinks

This article contains several bookstr macro wikilinks using the Douay-Rheims Bible (DRB) version.

== Introduction

The following passages are referenced using the NKBIP-08 bookstr macro format:

== Single Verse Reference

Check out [[book::bible | john 3:16 | drb]] for the famous verse.

== Verse Range Reference

See [[book::bible | romans 3:16-18 | drb]] for a range of verses.

== Multiple Versions

Compare [[book::bible | john 3:16 | drb kjv]] to see both versions side by side.

== Multiple References

Here are multiple passages: [[book::bible | romans 1:16-17, psalms 23:1 | drb]].

== Without Collection

You can also use [[book::john 3:16 | drb]] without specifying the collection.

== Conclusion

All these wikilinks should render as inline book passage cards with Bible Gateway links.
tags: Test Article with DRB Bible Wikilinks
An article testing bookstr macro with DRB Bible references
